author: Simon Difford
description: Whiskey and cola with extra interest courtesy of several other spirits and lemon juice.
name: Tennessee Iced Tea
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first six ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with cola and serve with straws
